Class javax.servlet.mail.MailAddress 

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.servlet.mail.MailAddress
public class MailAddress
extends Object
implements Serializable
This class defines an internet mail address.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
MailAddress(String header)
          Creates this object from a string with the format: 
description <mailbox@host>
MailAddress(String description, String address)
          Creates this object from a description and the mail address with the format: 
user@host
MailAddress(String description, String mailbox, String host)
          Creates this object from description, mailbox and host.
 
Method Summary
String getAddress()
          Returns the address with the format: 
mailbox@host

void setHost(String host)
           
void setMailbox(String mailbox)
           
String toString()
          Returns the fully qualified address with the format: 
description <mailbox@host>
